focus_mode_subtitle: Ctrl+Shift+F Focus Mode - Let words flow freely
ai_todo_title: AI + Todo Integration: Smart Life Assistant
ai_todo_subtitle: This is not cyberpunk, this is life
scenario_habit_case: You write in your notes: "Having trouble waking up lately, must get up at 6 AM tomorrow."
scenario_habit_response: At 6 AM the next day, AI recognizes your need and calls you through the todo plugin to remind you
scenario_travel_case: You copy a travel guide from Xiaohongshu and paste it into your notes
scenario_travel_response: AI automatically extracts time points from the guide and sends you WeChat messages at the right time: "Time to go to the next attraction!"
scenario_meeting_case: You're a company manager and recorded this week's meeting schedule in your notes
scenario_meeting_response: Your team members receive meeting reminders via DingTalk, email or WeChat at the right time, never missing one
